description: For the specified directory, lists all the certificates registered for a secure LDAP or client certificate authentication.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: Indicates whether another page of certificates is available when the number of available certificates exceeds the page limit.

nested_items.name: CertificatesInfo
nested_items.description: A list of certificates with basic details including certificate ID, certificate common name, certificate state.

nested_items.name: CommonName
nested_items.description: The common name for the certificate.

nested_items.name: ExpiryDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time when the certificate will expire.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The function that the registered certificate performs. Valid values include ClientLDAPS or ClientCertAuth. The default value is ClientLDAPS.
